channel.title: No RSPS client will download cache
channel.description:
Hey guys!
In need of a bit of help here,
So, whenever I download any client on it's own, no extra files or cache, I start it up, but the majority of the time when it starts to download the cache, it stays at 0%. Sometimes it reaches up to like 3,4 or 5% but it never goes any further. It just freezes! When I download a client in a .ZIP or .RAR that comes with the files already, it works like a charm!
Any have a solution?
I'm also running on Windows 7 and I have the latest Java installed.

item.title: No RSPS client will download cache
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

Do you mean that you download someone’s client and then you open client?
you must be sure, that link isnt dead and cache is still there to be autodownloaded.

Read full topic
item.source: No RSPS client will download cache
